title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 103.3 - Authority for representation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 103.3 - Authority for representation

State Regulations

Any person appearing before the board in a representative
capacity may be required to show his authority to act in such
capacity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
103.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
